data.message: Thank you Em your songs got me through some tough times in Afghanistan

replies.message: killing innocent people would be hard
No I was army with 101st airborne
Your welcome Dale Carson I did and many of my other brothers and sisters liked and died so you didn't have to

died so he didn't have to? he was just smart enough not to go to pointless wArs that are all about money and oil that's all these people die for, they kill millions of civilians more than 'enemies'..5ont fight pointless wars.. 9/11 was an inside job by the US government as a way to get from country to country throuugh the war on terror.

Kieran Layton your also welcome and I thank you for your support of the 1st amendment and I'm glad to fight for that right you abs Dale and so do those past present and future that have and will die I hope you guys have a great night
Look at it this way, what would happen if all of the troops left the Middle East?

Omg u guys are so retarded, i didn't believe my friends when they said there actually were some americans so retarded they thought 9/11 was a inside job haha, and u talk down to a soldier who fought/fights for your country? show some respect scrubs ! You wouldn't be anywhere if there aren't some military people for you little shit
You two retards leave the soldier alone... He was just thanking Eminem. How dare you talk down to the guys/girls who endure being away from their families just for the sake of your own country. 😒
Andrew and Rosanna thank you for your support
You mother fuckers!!!!!! You better learn what American support is. I hope I see you on the street and you have the balls to say what you said to my brother here, I will rip your fucking throat out.
